hero.title: We’re always here to help answer your questions
hero.description: Learn the ins and outs of how the funding works. If you’d like to learn more about joining our portfolio, get in touch.

qa.question: How much fuanding do you offer?
qa.answer: We can deploy between £10,000 and £2,000,000 at a time.

qa.question: Does the repayment percentage ever change?
qa.answer: Outfund uses a unique corporate revenue share to fund the growth of our portfolio companies. We have powerful predictive models that look at your revenue, ad performance and other third party data to generate funding offers. Our funding is based on your performance. We don't take equity, meaning we don't dilute you or your investors.

qa.question: Can I apply for funding if I have a business partner?
qa.answer:
To fund your company, we need you to have the following:
  • Open banking
  • Online Payment processor
  • Trading for at least 6 months
  • Greater than £10,000 turnover pm

qa.question: Why do you need my bank account information?
qa.answer: We can deploy between £10,000 and £2,000,000 at a time.
